articles.title: Covid-19 antibodies last 8 months after infection: Study, Europe News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: They were present regardless of the severity of the illness and the age of the patients.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
ROME (AFP) - Antibodies against coronavirus remained in the blood of patients with Covid-19 for at least eight months after they were infected, Italian researchers said Tuesday (May 11).
